page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = SkipToDigit as l()

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: True if an digit was found.

page.description: Skip until a digit (0-9) is encountered. Return true if successful.
page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.SkipToDigit() function moves the offset to the next digit (0-9). The offset does not move if it is already pointing to a digit.
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful prose written by a technical 12 writer of note. %text% scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) ? scanner.skiptodigit() = .T. ? scanner.GetToOffset() = This is wonderful prose written by a technical ? scanner.GetRemainder() = 12 writer of note.
